text: Ara yadera durbala kara hayechila tara balabe tadera yara garba karachila -- ''bastuta rata o dinera cakranta, yakhana tomara amadera hukuma karate yena amara allah‌ke abisbasa kari ebam tamra sange ansi sthapana kari.’’ Ara tara yakhana sasti pratyaksa karabe takhana tara aphasose akula habe. Ara yara abisbasa posana karata tadera galaya amara sikala paraba. Tadera ki pratidana de'oya hacche tara ya kare calechila ta chara an'ya kichu diye.
